snippet: An Italian appeals court on Monday overturned the terrorism conviction of a Tunisian man who had spent nine years in the United States military prison in Guantánamo, Cuba.
abstract: Italian appeals court overturns the terrorism conviction of a Tunisian man, Mohamed Ben Riadh Nasri, who had spent nine years in the United States military prison in Guantanamo, Cuba.
lead_paragraph: An Italian appeals court on Monday overturned the terrorism conviction of a Tunisian man who had spent nine years in the United States military prison in Guantánamo, Cuba.

headline.main: Italy: Court Reverses Conviction of Former Guantánamo Prisoner
headline.print_headline: Italy: Court Reverses Conviction Of Former Guantánamo Prisoner
